name: Ancient Russian Life Simulator
description:
The most realistic simulator of life of ancient Russ during the war with lizards! A historical saga of the greatness of our ancestors, bravely fighting the green plague outnumbering them! Destroy the lizards, get experience to study the secret techniques of the ancient Russ and bring their bodies to the gods, receiving blessings

Features of life of ancient Russ:

  • The skills tree, allowing to learn secret techniques of ancient Russ, such as Slavic clamp with eggs, Slavic shot of the chest, Slavic fire with buns, GOYDA! So far, 26 secret techniques have been discovered from the oldest birch bark manuscripts
  • The greatest feats of ancient Russ in times of the first Russ-Lizards war are transferred to this game that each Russ could take part in these great battles! Cut out lizards under Baikalsk, break through a great Slavic cauldron under Tyva, protect a great trading way in South African Russia, win lizards in Peleduisky beating and in many other significant for our people battles
  • Kill lizards in the name of the gods and sacrifice their bodies, in exchange for blessings! Feel the power of Baikal water, be filled with the power of lightning Perun, get at least 4 ancient Slavic education, tame the allies of the ancient Russ - dinosaurs and not only
  • Warrior power of ancient Russ depicted in full, lizards long tried to hide the true power of our ancestors, but now the truth came out, the ancient Russ could alone overpower legions of Herods, fertilize a hundred virgins overnight, and about their lightest training were legends.
  • The game does not use lizard pseudoscience - math, all calculations are performed in accordance with the rules of counting ancient Russ!
  • All code of game is written on orthodox B††, based on streams of Baikal, references of Siberian and indexes of the road
  • All events of the game are historically accurate, the sources used were scientific studies of the great thinkers of our time - Yuri Stepanovich Rybnikov, Alexei Sergeevich Bagirov, and the creators of the new textbook on the history of the Russian Federation.
  • 100% Russian voiceover, created by real historical voices
  • Fonk from the battlefields, under which our ancestors destroyed the lizards
